idea-plugin.name: ADB Wireless Manager
idea-plugin.description:
ADB Wireless Manager - Enhanced Version

A comprehensive plugin for managing wireless ADB connections with automatic SDK detection.

Features:

  • 🔧 Automatic Android SDK detection
  • ⚙️ Configurable ADB path settings
  • 📱 Add and manage wireless devices
  • 🔗 Connect/disconnect from devices
  • 📊 View connection status and logs
  • 🎯 Simple, intuitive interface
  • ⚡ Quick Connect via USB (enable and connect Wi‑Fi ADB in one click)

Setup:

  1. Go to Settings → Tools → ADB Wireless Manager to configure your Android SDK
  2. Open the ADB Wireless tool window
  3. Add your device with IP address or use Quick Connect via USB
  4. Pair and connect to establish wireless connection, or use USB once to enable Wi‑Fi ADB
  5. Start debugging wirelessly!

The plugin automatically detects your Android SDK or you can configure it manually in settings.
